name: Holy Sphere, Batman!
description:
HOLY SPHERE, BATMAN!

One Game A Month attempt for June 2015.

In this one you are a mobile hole on the ground. Put stuff in the hole to make it bigger. Put the biggest thing you can find on the map inside it to win!

(If you're thinking about this in a perverted way, then you're the problem, not the game. This game is totally innocent and appropriate for all ages.)
